description: Evaluation dataset for AI Call Center Assistant

test_cases.name: Simple billing inquiry - resolved
test_cases.transcript:
Agent: Thank you for calling TechCorp support. My name is Sarah. How can I help you today?

Customer: Hi Sarah, I have a question about my bill. I was charged $99 but I thought my plan was $79.

Agent: I'd be happy to help you understand your bill. Let me pull up your account. I can see that you were upgraded to the Premium plan last month, which is $99 per month.

Customer: Oh, I didn't authorize that upgrade.

Agent: I apologize for the confusion. I can see it was an automatic upgrade. I'll reverse that and credit you the $20 difference. Is there anything else I can help with?

Customer: No, that's perfect. Thank you so much!

Agent: You're welcome. Have a great day!

test_cases.name: Technical issue - escalated
test_cases.transcript:
Agent: Good afternoon, Tech Support. This is Mike speaking.

Customer: Hi Mike, my internet has been down for 3 days now. I've called 5 times already and nobody has fixed it.

Agent: I'm very sorry to hear about this ongoing issue. Let me check the status of your service tickets.

Customer: I work from home and this is costing me money. I need this fixed today.

Agent: I completely understand the urgency. I can see multiple tickets here. Unfortunately, this requires a technician visit. The earliest available slot is tomorrow between 9 AM and 12 PM. However, given the extended outage, I'm going to escalate this to our priority team.

Customer: Tomorrow is still not acceptable, but I guess it's better than nothing.

Agent: I'll also apply a service credit for the days you've been without service. A supervisor will call you within 2 hours to confirm the escalation.

Customer: Alright, thank you for at least trying to help.

test_cases.name: Abusive customer - profanity
test_cases.transcript:
Agent: Thank you for calling customer service. How may I assist you?

Customer: This is bullshit! Your damn company charged me twice and now my account is overdrawn!

Agent: I understand you're frustrated, and I apologize for the billing issue. Let me look into this right away.

Customer: You better fix this crap right now or I'm going to sue you people!

Agent: Sir, I can see the duplicate charge and I'm processing a refund immediately. It will be back in your account within 24 hours.

Customer: 24 hours? That's ridiculous! This is the worst company I've ever dealt with!

Agent: I understand your frustration. I can also provide a $25 courtesy credit for the inconvenience. Is there anything else I can help with?

Customer: Fine. Just make sure it actually happens this time.

test_cases.name: Product return - simple resolution
test_cases.transcript:
Agent: Hello, this is Lisa from Returns Department. How can I help?

Customer: Hi Lisa, I need to return a laptop I bought last week. It's not what I expected.

Agent: I can help with that. Do you have your order number?

Customer: Yes, it's ORD-789456.

Agent: Perfect. I see your order here. Since it's within our 30-day return window, I'll email you a prepaid shipping label. Once we receive the laptop, your refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.

Customer: Great, that sounds easy enough. Thank you!

Agent: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help with today?

Customer: No, that's all. Have a nice day!

Agent: You too!

test_cases.name: Account cancellation - unresolved
test_cases.transcript:
Agent: Thank you for calling. This is James from Account Services.

Customer: I want to cancel my subscription immediately.

Agent: I'm sorry to hear that. May I ask why you're looking to cancel?

Customer: I found a better deal with your competitor. They're offering the same service for half the price.

Agent: I understand. Before you go, I can offer you a 30% discount for the next 6 months. Would that interest you?

Customer: No, I've already made up my mind. I just want to cancel.

Agent: I understand. Unfortunately, our cancellation system is currently down for maintenance. You'll need to call back tomorrow after 9 AM, or you can submit a cancellation request through our website.

Customer: That's really inconvenient. I'll try the website.

Agent: I apologize for the inconvenience. Is there anything else I can help with?

Customer: No, goodbye.

test_cases.name: Positive feedback call
test_cases.transcript:
Agent: Good morning, Customer Care. This is Amanda.

Customer: Hi Amanda! I just wanted to call and say how happy I am with your service. The technician who came yesterday, David, was absolutely amazing!

Agent: Oh, that's wonderful to hear! Thank you so much for taking the time to share this feedback.

Customer: He fixed my heating system in no time and even gave me tips on maintenance. Please make sure his supervisor knows how great he was.

Agent: I absolutely will! I'm documenting this feedback right now and will make sure it reaches his manager. Is there anything else you'd like to add?

Customer: No, that's it. Just wanted to share some positivity. Have a great day!

Agent: Thank you so much! You've made our day. Take care!

test_cases.name: Threatening customer - high severity abuse
test_cases.transcript:
Agent: Customer service, how may I help you?

Customer: Listen carefully. If you don't refund my money right now, I'm going to come down to your office and make sure someone pays for this.

Agent: Sir, I understand you're upset, but I need to ask you to refrain from making threatening statements.

Customer: I don't care what you need. You people are thieves and I know where your headquarters is. Someone is going to regret this.

Agent: Sir, I'm going to have to end this call if you continue with threatening language. I want to help resolve your issue, but I cannot do so under these circumstances.

Customer: Fine, whatever. Just tell me how to get my refund.

Agent: I can help with that. Can you provide your order number so I can look into the refund?

test_cases.name: Multi-issue complex call
test_cases.transcript:
Agent: Thank you for calling Premium Support. I'm Rachel.

Customer: Hi Rachel, I have several issues to discuss. First, my bill shows a charge I don't recognize. Second, my mobile app keeps crashing. And third, I never received my rewards card.

Agent: I'll be happy to help with all of these. Let's start with the unrecognized charge. Can you tell me the amount and date?

Customer: It's $45.99 from January 15th.

Agent: I see that charge - it's for the premium add-on service. Were you not aware of this?

Customer: No, I didn't sign up for any add-on.

Agent: I apologize for the confusion. I'll remove that charge and refund the $45.99. Now, regarding the app crashing - what device are you using?

Customer: iPhone 14.

Agent: Please try deleting and reinstalling the app. If that doesn't work, call us back. Finally, for the rewards card - I see it was mailed on January 10th. It should arrive within 7-10 business days. If you don't receive it by January 25th, please call us.

Customer: Okay, thank you for handling all of this.

Agent: You're welcome! Anything else?

Customer: No, that's everything.

test_cases.name: Neutral inquiry - information only
test_cases.transcript:
Agent: Hello, this is InfoLine. How can I assist you?

Customer: Hi, I'm considering signing up for your service. Can you tell me about your different plans?

Agent: Of course! We have three plans: Basic at $29/month, Standard at $49/month, and Premium at $79/month.

Customer: What's the difference between them?

Agent: Basic includes 100GB storage and email support. Standard adds 500GB storage and phone support. Premium offers unlimited storage, priority support, and a dedicated account manager.

Customer: I see. And are there any contracts?

Agent: All plans are month-to-month with no long-term contracts. You can cancel anytime.

Customer: Great, I'll think about it and maybe sign up online. Thanks for the information.

Agent: You're welcome! Feel free to call back if you have any other questions.

test_cases.name: Warranty claim - partial resolution
test_cases.transcript:
Agent: Warranty Department, this is Tom speaking.

Customer: Hi Tom, my washing machine broke down and it's still under warranty. I need it repaired.

Agent: I'm sorry to hear that. Can you provide your warranty number?

Customer: Yes, it's WR-2024-55678.

Agent: Thank you. I can see your warranty is valid until March 2025. What seems to be the problem?

Customer: It's making a loud grinding noise and won't spin properly.

Agent: Based on what you're describing, this sounds like a motor issue. I can schedule a technician visit. The earliest available is next Thursday between 2-6 PM.

Customer: That's almost a week away. I have a lot of laundry piling up.

Agent: I understand. Unfortunately, that's our earliest slot. I can add you to the cancellation list in case something opens up sooner.

Customer: Alright, please do that. I'll take the Thursday appointment as backup.

Agent: Done. You'll receive a confirmation email shortly. Anything else?

Customer: No, thank you.

test_cases.name: Short frustrated call
test_cases.transcript:
Agent: Support line, how may I help?

Customer: I've been on hold for 45 minutes! This is unacceptable.

Agent: I sincerely apologize for the long wait time. How can I assist you today?

Customer: I need to update my address. That's it. 45 minutes for an address change.

Agent: I completely understand your frustration. Let me update that for you right now. What's your new address?

Customer: 123 Oak Street, Apartment 4B, Chicago, IL 60601.

Agent: Done. Your address has been updated. Is there anything else?

Customer: No. Goodbye.

test_cases.name: Harassment - discriminatory language
test_cases.transcript:
Agent: Thank you for calling. This is Priya, how can I help?

Customer: Oh great, another one of you people. Can I speak to a real American?

Agent: Sir, I'm here to help you with your inquiry. What can I assist you with today?

Customer: I can barely understand your accent. This is exactly what's wrong with companies today, outsourcing everything.

Agent: I apologize if you're having difficulty understanding me. I'm happy to speak more slowly. How can I help you?

Customer: Whatever. I need to check my balance.

Agent: I can help with that. Your current balance is $234.56. Is there anything else?

Customer: No.
